title: Held items update
message: Latest version: 0.1.9 - Added fully working held items (some are still missing) - Added the pokemon menu - Added the ability to change the eye and hair color of the trainer model - Added a new screen to the game results page - Added fully working in game quick chat (Thanks!) - Added Emboar as a playable character - Fixed rotom/regieleki being invisible - Fixed game starting before loading pokemons - Touched up trainer model loading On certain platforms the player clothes may take more time to download, if you don't see your avatar it's probably still downloading Thank you for downloading this game, welcome to the my unite recreation! As this is an early build bugs are expected and 100% going to happen, if you find any please report them in my discord server (link in the itch page) Currently not every feature from the original is implemented, here's a list of features that are missing and planned to be added: - Jump Pads - Wild pokemon AI - Some moves on certain pokemons - More settings options - Keyboard controls - Other things i may have missed But why should you play this? Idk at least you can't get slowbro united here. Jokes aside this is mainly so my concepts can actually be played. If quick join isn't finding any match it's likely that there are no open rooms at the moment, in that case i suggest you create an open room yourself. Lastly i hope you enjoy the experience and have some fun! Made with passion by JustMarcy (Of course the original game is owned by Timi studios, this project was purely made for educational purposes and does not intend to replace in any way the original)
